review: Bought as a Christmas gift for my Niece.. She loves using it, and says it exceeded all of her expectations..
author: D. ALLARD

review: Every time we try to stream a show or movie, there is a problem and we end up on the phone with an Amazon service tech who runs us through several steps...repeating the steps that we have previously done.  not sure why it can't just ... work the first time.  very frustrating. so after about a 20 minute wait, then another 20-30 minutes on the phone with a tech, it finally does work.  prevents us from using it more often and from recommending  it to anyone.
author: Karen K. Hibey

review: Great product! Easy set up and easy to use.
author: Noomom

review: Everything it advertised it would be. Some problems setting it up, but not Amazon's fault. ISP info had to be corrected to allow integration of Firestick with TV service.
author: joe russoniello

review: It seems to be a piece of junk.  When trying to play anything it just keeps buffering and buffering.  Amazon temporarily fixed the problem, but now it continues to malfuntion.  The cable company tested their signal and it was up to specs.  The TV Fire Stick  was a gift, so suppose I shouldn't complain, but the gift giver is out the cost of the unit.  I tried several fixes that other people had tried, but no luck.  Oh well...
author: Lynne Young

review: After finally getting it hooked up, I really like it and glad I got it.

review: I love this for my Amazon account... but it WILL NOT work with my Netflix account.  There is no one to troubleshoot this issue with.
